# Used Car Price Predictions

## Problem Statement
- This dataset contains data about used cars in India. In contains information like the make, model, year of manufacture, as well as infromation like kilometers driven (odometer), transmission, body type, and more. 

- With this dataset, I will make a model to accurately predict car prices, as well as determine if the car will be in high demand or not.
